item.description:
Featured Speaker: Jennifer Van Beckum

Topic: Networking – Debunking the Myth

Cost: Members $10 / Nonmembers $15

Members: Pay $15 through Meetup, and receive a $5 refund at the door.

 

The WBOA is hosting its first-ever WBOA After 5. This is more than just a networking event. We’ll be introducing sponsors, having a speaker, engaging in a round or two of speed networking, and have a raffle.

 

Join us for hors d’oeuvres, the After 5 Cocktail (in both high-test and non-alcoholic versions), and effective networking!

 

Raffle Prizes!

Maureen Sullivan and Girls Just Wanna Have Fun will be donating 2 tickets to the Mama Gena performance at City Stage (tickets are $48 EACH) as a Raffle Prize! Each woman who purchases a ticket to the WBOA After 5 networking event gets a free raffle ticket.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sponsored By

Susan Lecuyer, Scentsy consultant

Scentsy Wickless Candles - Flameless, no soot, lead-free, no smoke, no burning wax... just a safe, yummy fragrance through your whole home! The highly scented wax melts over a light bulb in a stylish ceramic warmer. So simple, so safe, so Scentsy!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

{celebrate} Epic.

We're a boutique wedding film studio that believes in visual storytelling and preserving life's most precious moments. Our team of creative filmmakers carefully craft each one of our films with the goal in mind of creating a piece of cinema that you'll love to watch over and over again. Our films tell the personal story of each of our couples, while highlighting the little moments that build into the unforgettable memories throughout the day.

Every epic love story makes it to film. Let Epic Filmmakers capture yours.

{work} Epic
item.name: WBOA After 5: More Than Just Networking
